alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Cass; Ransom (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 6:25PM CDT until June 07 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Ransom County in southeastern North Dakota... Southwestern Cass County in southeastern North Dakota... Southern Barnes County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 625 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lucca to 9 miles north of Litchville, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Litchville, Fingal, Fort Ransom, Nome, Hastings, Kathryn and Lucca. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
